screen_desc: It seems like the image was not provided properly. Could you try uploading it again?
history_actions: click on the Settings icon located at the upper left.
click on the "System" option located at the middle-lower part of the screen.
click on the "Languages & input" located at the upper left.
click on the "Virtual keyboard" settings located at the left and upper middle part of the screen.
click on the "Gboard Multilingual typing" option located at the upper left side of the screen.
click on the "Theme" located at upper middle and left.
click on the theme option located at right and lower middle.
click on the "APPLY" button located at the lower right.

think.Thought: The user wants to change the appearance of the keyboard. I am currently on the theme settings screen for Gboard. The green color theme is already selected and applied. Since the user did not specify a particular theme color or style, the next logical action is to either select a different color or a custom theme if available. I can also guide the user to create a custom theme by clicking the 'My themes' option at the top.
Future Action Plan: Click on the 'My themes' option located at the upper left to explore further customization options.
